Service Details: - Offers a developmentally appropriate, balanced approach to education that integrates the arts and academics for children from preschool through twelfth grade- Encourages the development of each child’s sense of truth, beauty, and goodness, and provides an antidote to violence, alienation, and cynicism- Aims to inspire in each student a lifelong love of learning, and to enable them to fully develop their unique capacities- Teaches French and German from the age of 5
Cost: Service ; Rates vary by grade; please contact us for additional information or visit the website
